name: Meta
description: Meta Platforms, Inc., formerly known as Facebook, Inc., is a multinational technology conglomerate.

name: Apple
description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company that specializes in consumer electronics, software, and online services.

name: Amazon
description: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational conglomerate that focuses on e-commerce, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.

name: Netflix
description: Netflix, Inc. is an American subscription streaming service and production company.

name: Google
description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.

name: TCS
description: Tata Consultancy Services is an Indian multinational information technology services and consulting company.
